In a bustling village, a tiny mouse named Milo discovered an abandoned shoe nestled beneath an old oak tree. With a few twigs and leaves, he transformed it into a cozy home. Each day, Milo scoured the village for crumbs, befriending the children who played nearby. One day, a fierce storm hit, and the shoe began to float in a puddle. Milo, brave and clever, rallied his friends—birds and squirrels—to rescue the shoe. They formed a chain, pulling it to safety. Grateful, Milo invited them all to a grand feast inside his shoe, turning it into a beloved gathering place for all.
